headline.main: Reefs Menace Troops; New Type of Landing Craft Needed For Attacks on Pacific Islands

lead_paragraph: The extreme difficulties of landing on a strongly defended beach -- long a textbook axiom -- have now been personally experienced by Americans at Salerno and Tarawa.
abstract: H W Baldwin on Pacific amphibious operations problems
snippet: The extreme difficulties of landing on a strongly defended beach -- long a textbook axiom -- have now been personally experienced by Americans at Salerno and Tarawa....
